title: Short-Intensive Course for Strengthening Online Language Learning Management Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic digital learning tools and primary/secondary language knowledge
context.additional_context: Most learners are students interested in or preparing for employment in language education. The course requires a balance between real-time interaction and self-directed learning in individual tablet/laptop environments.

learning_goals: Individual language learning plans can be established and adjusted using a Learning Management System (LMS)
Feedback-based language practice activities are conducted with peers using real-time online collaboration tools (e.g., Zoom Breakout Rooms, Jamboard)
The process of improving learning strategies by analyzing formative assessment data can be explained
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
